author: The Canyon News
title: Ground News - FAITH: Move FORWARD with purpose instead of falling back • The Canyon News
text:
Summary by The Canyon News One word that God has been placing on my heart as we close out 2023 and embrace what lies ahead in 2024 is FORWARD. In a lot of ways, moving FORWARD steers us in the right direction. Moving FORWARD into 2024 takes patience. Moving FORWARD in 2024 takes trust. Moving FORWARD in 2024 takes giving The post FAITH: Move FORWARD with purpose instead of falling back appeared first on The Canyon News. Share menu More
